item.title: Quanta API
item.description: 查询股票总市值和流通市值 总市值：mktcap 流通市值：nmc import tushare as ts df = ts.get_today_all() df.head() df = ts.get_today_all() code name changepercent trade open high low settlement volume turnoverratio amount per pb mktcap nmc 0 601500 通用股份 10.035 9.43 9.43 9.43 9.43 8.57 24800 0.01418

item.title: VNPY安装和使用
item.description: 安装VNPY 安装python 2 and virtualenv (1) python2 brew install python then ~/.bashrc PATH=/usr/local/bin::$PATH then 退出，在重新进入 iterm2 (2) virtualenv pip install virtualenv ### 建立virtualenvs bash mkdir .virtualenvs cd .virtualenvs virtualenv -p python vnpy export WORKON_HOME=~/.virtualenvs source ~/.virtualenvs/vnpy/bin/activate pip install virtualenvwrapper

item.title: Quanta Program
item.description: toc: true IsOpen (Holiday) #!/usr/bin/env python """ 股市日历，没费接口 """ import pandas as pd import tushare as ts ts.set_token('88888888888888888') mt = ts.Master() df = mt.TradeCal(exchangeCD='XSHG', beginDate='20150928', endDate='20151010', field='calendarDate,isOpen,prevTradeDate') Understandings 1 Notes Call data_handler self.events = queue.Queue() data_handler(self.pairs, self.events, self.csv_dir) 2 debug start from mac.py : HistoricCSVPriceHandler ->(data_handler) => backtest(`data_handler`) => price.py(`PriceHandler`) => _set_up_prices_dict(self) => prices_dict = { 'USDGBP': {'ask': None, 'bid': None, 'time':

item.title: Quanta Resources
item.description: toc: true CTP 接口资料 https://www.citicsf.com/download/ctp http://www.sfit.com.cn/5_2_DocumentDown.htm 国内量化交易接口 easytrader 基于python程序 smurfyquant.com 基于同花顺、通达信的客户端 Quanta Resourses: www.reddit.com www.joinquant.com Forex Trading Demo Project Forex Sign in repo in github List Forex Trading Diary #1 - Automated Forex Trading with the OANDA API Forex
